I am skilled in several programming languages such as R, Python, Scala, Java, Ruby, and Javascript (including node.js and React.js). I have developed several open-source libraries and projects related to my research or teaching, as well as industry collaborations.

```{r, include=F}
library(dplyr)
Software = rio::import("cv.xlsx", sheet = "Software")
generateSW <- function(Title, Description, Repo, Demo, Web, Logo) {
  # Determine whether to include image
  image_html <- if (!is.na(Logo) && Logo != "") {
    paste0(
      '<img src="', Logo, '" class="img-thumbnail me-3" alt="', Title, ' logo" ',
      'style="width: 100px; height: auto; object-fit: contain;">'
    )
  } else {
    ""
  }

  result <- paste0(
    '<div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
      <div class="card shadow-sm h-100 d-flex flex-row align-items-center p-3">',
        image_html,
        '<div class="card-body p-2">
          <h5 class="card-title">', Title, '</h5>
          <p class="card-text">', Description, '</p>',
          ifelse(is.na(Repo), '', paste0('<a class="btn btn-dark btn-sm me-2" href="', Repo, '" target="_blank">Github</a>')),
          ifelse(is.na(Web), '', paste0('<a class="btn btn-danger btn-sm me-2" href="', Web, '" target="_blank">Website</a>')),
          ifelse(is.na(Demo), '', paste0('<a class="btn btn-warning btn-sm" href="', Demo, '" target="_blank">Demo</a>')),
        '</div>
      </div>
    </div>'
  )

  htmltools::HTML(result)
}



sww<-Software %>% rowwise %>% dplyr::mutate(Text = generateSW(Title,	Description,	Repo,	Demo,	Web, Logo) )



```
